text: Ara manusake yakhana duhkha-dain'ya sparsa kare takhana se suye, base ba damriye amaderake deke thake [1]. Atahpara amara yakhana tara duhkha-dain'ya dura kari, takhana se emanabhabe calate thake yena take duhkha-dain'ya sparsa karara para tara jan'ya se amaderake dake'ini. Ebhabe simalanghanakaridera kaja tadera kache sobhaniya kare deya hayeche
